short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds V4Fire debugging tools to the Chrome Developer Tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser DevTools extension for debugging V4Fire applications.

This extension supports only 4th version of the V4Fire framework.

V4Fire is a meta-framework which uses Vue.js as render engine, see: https://github.com/V4Fire/Client
